solution_line_template: Augustus and Luna can make a total of {augustus_rate} + {luna_rate} = <<{augustus_rate}+{luna_rate}={combined_rate}>>{combined_rate} milkshakes per hour.
Therefore, they made a total of {combined_rate} x {hours_worked} = <<{combined_rate}*{hours_worked}={total_milkshakes}>>{total_milkshakes} milkshakes in {hours_worked} hours.
